title: FS:  T206 HOF, Backs, Packs (Hall Of Fame, Tolstoi, Packs+)
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 HOF, Backs, Packs (Hall Of Fame, Tolstoi, Packs+)
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone. I have a small crop of T206 cards and tobacco packs available for anyone who is interested. All prices include shipping. Please feel free to write me for imagery at t206society@gmail.com. I am happy to work with you.

Thank you very much.

Derek

Standard Back HOF

Joe Tinker (Portrait) - Piedmont 150 (PSA 2)  *SOLD*

Exotic Back HOF & Stars

Chick Gandil (Black Sox) - Tolstoi (SGC 3)  *SOLD*
Zack Wheat - Tolstoi (SGC 2) *SOLD*
Rube Marquard (Portrait) - Sovereign 350 (PSA 2.5)  *SOLD*

Hello everyone. Here is a list of some nice T206 items I have available for anyone who is interested. If you would like to see imagery please email me at t206society@gmail.com. Thank you :)

Derek
